descriptionHtml:
Animate your photo or video and give magic touch to your video.

Download this "Magic Video Editor - Magic Video Maker 2020" app, create video and apply various "magic effects" into video and give unique look up to your video.

You can easily apply magic effects into video no need to hire professional photographer or choreographer to create stunning video.

This "magic video maker with music" is one of the best app or tool for editing various magical effects into video.

This awesome "magic video maker with music and photo" is an artificial intelligence powered video maker or builder or editor application, Which provides tons of Fictional Movie Level video effects. Now You Become a superhero or role model and realize childhood dream by creating or making fantastic magic video stories.

Now Create Your Video Story as a your favorite super hero or create your fairy tale story and edit it with various best magic effects.

This "magic video maker with photos" or "magic video maker editor" app Offers various categories magic effects like super hero, Halloween, fairy tale, fire, love, ice, funny,etc.

This "magic video master" or "magic video maker lite" app also contains wide collection of short video templates, huge collection of stickers, text and quotes, various type of effects and filters. So now, Use them and create or get new shape or look to you video and share it with friends and loving ones and make special filling into your friends' or loving ones' heart

magic video maker with song app key features:

- Pick photo from gallery. You can crop, rotate, zoom in or out photo with photo editor.
- Apply Animation Magic Effect into photo like: Fire Effect, Thunder effect, Light Magic Effect, Rain Effect, Snow Effect, Heart Effect, ice foaling down effect, hallowed effect,etc.
- Add background music into your video.
- Export high quality video and share video to your friends.

Few steps for making magic video from your own photos?

- Start Magic Video Editor - Magic Video Maker 2020 app
- Pick your beautiful images from gallery
- Edit your images if you want
- Change contrast,brightness,saturation,
- Add cool Stickers, Text(change color,font style,Size)
- Apply various magic effects and filters on photo
- Pick the best song from our collection or from phone gallery
- After creating video see the preview of your creation
- Save it and Share your awesome lyrical video on social media or with friends and loving ones

Every one is not a good magician but that doesn't mean you can't create unique and best magic video.

Download this one of the best Magic video status maker app, and make unique and amazing magic video for social media status.

If you like this app then rate us from 5 stars; probably 5 stars, review it and share the app link with your friends and family. hope you enjoy with this app.

Thank you for installing and using this amazing and magic app!
